Directed by Kazuhiro Furuhashi.

Written by Tatsuya Endo. Tomomi Kawaguchi. Rino Yamazaki.

Cast  Atsumi Tanezaki( Anya Forger 2) . Megan Shipman( Anya Forger 2) . Alex Organ( Loid Forger 2) . Saori Hayami( Yor Forger 2) . Natalie Sistine( Yor Forger 2) . Ken’ichirô Matsuda( Narration 2) . Hana Sato( Emile Elman 1) . Masafumi Kobatake( Bartender 1) . Shoumaru Zouza( Eden Academy Teacher 1) . Katsunori Okai( Eden Academy Teacher 1) . Emiri Kato( Becky Blackbell 1) . Shinya Takahashi( Tennis commentator 1) . Natsumi Fujiwara( Damian Desmond 1) . Haruka Okamura( Ewen Egeberg 1) . Mirei Kumagai( Sharon 1) . Emiko Takeuchi( Eden Academy Student 1) . Marie Ôi( Eden Academy Student 1) . Hiroki Gotô( WISE intelligence officer 1) . Yuko Kaida( Sylvia Sherwood 1) . Motoki Sakuma( Eden Academy Teacher 1) . Takaaki Torashima( Ball boy 1 1) . Shôhei Kajikawa( Domin/epic 1) . Kenshô Ono( Yuri Briar ) . Kazuhiro Yamaji( Henry Henderson ) . Taisuke Nakano( Bondman ) . Hiroyuki Yoshino( Franky Franklin ) . Marisa Duran( Additional Voices ) . Umeka Shôji( Camilla ) . Serika Hiromatsu( Eden Academy Student ) . Lindsay Seidel( Fiona Frost ) . Kimmie Britt( Additional Voices ) . Macy Anne Johnson( Emile Elman ) . Anthony Bowling( Franky Franklin ) . Barry Yandell( Henry Henderson ) . Akio Ôtsuka( WISE Director ) . Momoe Kishimoto( Neighbor ) . Stephanie Young( Sylvia Sherwood ) . Kelsey Maher( Bystander ) . Michelle Rojas( Ewen Egeburg ) . Tyler Walker( Bond Forger ) . Hiroki Takahashi( Keith Kepler ) . Kelly Greenshield( Neighbor ) . Ai Kaneta( Class 3 student ) . Yôji Ueda( Cavi Campbell ) . Yuuki Shin( Carrol Campbell ) . Jin Urayama( Murdoch Swan ) . Satsumi Matsuda( Kim Campbell ) . Shouko Tsuda( Martha ) . Tadashi Makino( Sniper ) . Kento Shiraishi( Ball boy 2 ) . Takaya Hashi( Donovan Desmond ) . Yasuyuki Kase( State Security Service Lieutenant ) . Arisa Kiyoto( Eden Academy Student ) . Jordan Dash Cruz( Domin/epic ) . SuzAnne DeCarma( Nurse ) . Saima Nakano( Class 4 student ) . Yoshitsugu Kawashima( Photographer ) . Saaya Anzai( Eden Academy Student ) . Miyu Komaki( Princess Honey ) . Kentaro Takano( Terrorist ) . Hiroshi Yanaka( Walter Evans ) . Atsushi Ono( Edgar ) . Yuji Murai( Nguyen ) . Hiroki Yasumoto( Bill Watkins ) . Aoi Ichikawa( Demetrius Desmond ) . Shun Horie( George Glooman ) . Yûichi Nakamura( Daybreak ) . Akari Tadano( Monica McBride ) . Aleks Le( Passerby ) . Clifford Chapin( Keith Kepler ) . Brittney Karbowski( Eden College Student ) . Ricco Fajardo( Passerby ) . Sarah Wiedenheft( Yuri Briar (child) ) . Ciarán Strange( Student ) . Christopher Wehkamp( Murdoch Swan ) . Jun’ichi Suwabe( Shopkeeper ) . Jim Foronda( Shopkeeper ) . Morgan Laure( Camilla ) . Aaron Campbell( Bondman ) . Matthew David Rudd( Nguyen ) . Molly Searcy( Princess Honey ) . Jalitza Delgado( Alice ) . Marianne Bray( Herman ) . Van Barr Jr.( Additional Voices ) . Anthony DiMascio( State Security Service Director ) . Nicholas Markgraf( Additional Voices ) . Jirô Saitô( State Security Service Director ) . Ruriko Noguchi( Aquarium announcement ) . Jeff Plunk( Hayward ) . Hinata Minami( Eden Academy Student ) . Yôhei Tadano( Eden Academy Principal ) . Uko Tachibana( WISE Contact ) . Mikoto Nakai( Eden Academy Student ) . Christian Rain Cavanaugh( Eden School Test Taker ) . Hinata Satô( Eden Academy Student ) . Miho Hino( WISE intelligence officer ) . Naoki Bando( Brantz ) . Yoko Fujita( Eden School Test Taker ) . Naomi Sano( Announcer ) . Itsuki Kurita( Eden School Test Taker ) . Mari Uchiyama( Eden Academy Applicant ) . Satoru Ito( Realtor ) . Chihiro Ibuki( Chief Nurse ) . Yûko Sasaki( Old woman ) . KyLeigh Zimmerer( Eden College Applicant )

Language Japanese.

Producers Akifumi Fujio. Ryo Fujita. Yuichi Fukushima. Tatsuro Hayashi. Yoshihisa Heishi. Rei Marumo. Murakami Masa. Tetsuya Nakatake. Takaaki Nakazawa. Takayuki Oshima. Masaya Saitou. Akira Shimizu. Atsushi Takahashi. Jouji Wada. Takako Yamamori. Kazutaka Yamanaka. Mirai Yamauchi.

Production Aniplex. CloverWorks. TOHO animation.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 26

Status OnGoing (2022–)
